author: bencomic

right.text: people have parts bills that they aren't paying. people owe $10000, and they keep charging more. it's sad, but it's life

left.text: Anyway my dad actually didin't get paid last month, because the business couldn't afford it

right.text: and since the business is tied to our house and grandma/ grandpa's house and my aunt and uncle's house we could loose our houses too

left.text: we live month to month wondering if the business is going to fold.
anyway, what do you think of that?

title: THE BALLAD OF JOHN JR: Part 24
